ServiceSid.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the Sync Map Item resource to delete.

MapSid.description: The SID of the Sync Map with the Sync Map Item resource to delete. Can be the Sync Map resource's `sid` or its `unique_name`.

Key.description: The `key` value of the Sync Map Item resource to delete.

If-Match.description: If provided, applies this mutation if (and only if) the “revision” field of this [map item] matches the provided value. This matches the semantics of (and is implemented with) the HTTP [If-Match header](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/If-Match).
